attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown must resign as Prime Minister with immediate effect. He was the Chancellor of the Exchequer at the time the seeds for the current financial crisis in the United Kingdom where sown, and now in his position as Prime Minister he has brought the United Kingdom to edge of disaster.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
